title: Field
description: Fields are data definitions that can be used in templates. Implementations combine templates and their fields to produce customer-defined XDMs.

xdm:name.title: Field Name
xdm:name.description: The field name that will be used in the XDM definition.

xdm:title.title: Title
xdm:title.description: The field title. Used as the label in forms.
